While most of these events are not recruiting events, it's all about developing relationships with the right people to build your network and uncover potential employment opportunities.      networking           built in             ita             chicago tech events             mccormick place             meetup             eventbrite           Local & Other Off-Campus Events        Apr  6  2020      ThinkChicago Resume Book Submissions: Deadline May 22nd (For all STEM junior, senior and grad students)     4/6/20, 12:00 am–5/22/20, 12:00 am         May  31  2020      Tensar Geogrid Scholarship Competition (Civil)     Sunday, 12:00 am–12:00 pm           Sep  11  2020      Fall 2020 Out 4 U Engineering Conference     Friday 11th, 12:00 am–Sunday 13th, 12:00 am                Events           Find Local Events    Career Fair Info
